full_text:
Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
From Lee Plourde
To [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)]
Date 2019/08/10 19:16
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Ok.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/10/19 7:14 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>, Lee Plourde [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>, NYM/Exec Assistant~ <NYM/ExecAssistant~@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] 08/10/2019 19:14 >>>
Thanks Lee, I just forwarded it to my bosses for their awareness.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: NYM/Exec Assistant~ <NYM/ExecAssistant~@bop.gov>
Date: 8/10/19 6:51 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>> "NYM/Exec Assistant~" 08/10/2019 18:51 >>>
[b)(7)(E)]
Thank you
Lee
>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @buzzfeed.com> 8/10/2019 6:03 PM >>>
Hello,
I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out because we suspect one of the paramedics involved in responding the Jeffery Epstein call posted information online before it was reported in the mainstream

Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
From Lee Plourde
To [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)]
Date 2019/08/10 19:16
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/10/19 7:14 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>, Lee Plourde [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>, NYM/Exec Assistant~ <NYM/ExecAssistant~@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] 08/10/2019 19:14 >>>
Thanks Lee, I just forwarded it to my bosses for their awareness.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: NYM/Exec Assistant~ <NYM/ExecAssistant~@bop.gov>
Date: 8/10/19 6:51 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>> "NYM/Exec Assistant~" 08/10/2019 18:51 >>>
[b)(7)(E)]
Thank you
Lee
>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C)] @buzzfeed.com> 8/10/2019 6:03 PM >>>
Hello,
I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out because we suspect one of the paramedics involved in responding the Jeffery Epstein call posted information online before it was reported in the mainstream

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing a potential leak in a hospital regarding Epstein's death. The email chain includes multiple redactions, indicating sensitive information has been removed.
